text: Michel Mathiot (23 August 1926 - 2 February 1999) was a French gymnast. He competed at the 1948, 1952, 1956 and the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:1999 deaths Category:French male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of France Category:Gymnasts at the 1948 Summer Olympics Category:Gymnasts at the 1952 Summer Olympics Category:Gymnasts at the 1956 Summer Olympics Category:Gymnasts at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Besançon
title: Michel Mathiot
